text: @realDonaldTrump Roger Goodell didn't "intimate" anything. It's clear that players will be allowed to take a knee. It's rather interesting that with #COVID19 still killing hundreds of Americans each day, and a disastrous economy, this subject is what keeps you up at night. Pathetic.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
